name: Prototype: Blob is Bob
description:
Demo:  Unfortunately won't be able to finish it right now for the jam (new year and all), but I didn't want to simply drop it, so here's what I made in the time I had, a simple prototype! It has only minor core mechanics. But I do intend on continuing its development!
  • [ S P A C E ] ==>  <ASSEMBLE>
  • [ W A S D ] ==>  <MOVE & JUMP>
  • [ SHIFT ] ==>  <RUN>
